entry.title: Le Morte d'Arthur: Destiny Calls
entry.summary:
Author: elfinnemrys

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 70,028Chapters: 29/31Kudos: 69

Summary: Merlin has been wandering for centuries. Waiting for the exact, unknown time that Arthur shall rise again.He becomes a lady of King Henry VIII.He meets Robin Hood and they share a fondness that once reminded him of a certain Prince.He bumps into Matthew Hopkins, the Witchfinder General, more times than he would like, dying a different death each time.But he always comes back.He falls in love and, in turn, becomes a father, a grandfather, and a lonely old man still waiting, waiting, waiting.But this is Matty's story - Merlin's granddaughter. And the ghost of Arthur follows her everywhere.This fic is completed, so don't worry about me not updating it. All in due time :)

entry.title: The Price
entry.summary:
Author: dante0220

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,328Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 9

Summary: In the "Wicked Day", Merlin tries to save Uther's life. As Emrys, he tries to cast the healing spell. Unfortunately, Morgana's necklace contains an *extra* twist. As both healing spell and aging spell go wrong, Merlin is forced to flee. Kilgarrah takes him to safety. Mithian and Rodor grant him sanctuary. There Merlin realizes still more about his secondary royal destiny.

entry.title: To Ransom Ones Heart
entry.summary:
Author: Maddie578

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,225Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Camelot’s glory is fading, and King Uther will do anything to restore it. Set in a land where Camelot is no longer the greatest kingdom in the land, King Uther sends his miscreant son Arthur to a neighbouring Kingdom to seduce and ransom its Princess. But in Camilard, nothing is as it seems—and the prince soon learns what happens when the heart he’s meant to steal becomes the one he cannot live without. What will happen when the prince learns there is more to the King's plot than anyone knows, Arthur must choose between his father’s crown and the woman who awakens his soul.

entry.title: The Trial of Uther Pendragon
entry.summary:
Author: HerMajestyofLichtenstein

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,171Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 909

Summary: When Morgana invokes a long forgotten spell, the ancient and powerful Court of Magic is summoned to pass judgment on Uther Pendragon and his bloodline for their crimes against the magical world. But for the verdict to be carried out, every seat on the Council must be filled, and the chair of the Dragonlords has long stood empty. Now Merlin faces an impossible choice: reveal his true identity to cast the final vote, risking exposure and execution... or remain silent and let justice fall upon his best friend's father.

entry.title: Sweep Me Up and Take Me Somewhere Higher
entry.summary:
Author: kiera_wesley

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,041Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 48

Summary: “All by yourself?” Morgana asks when he steps into the clearing of trees, her face almost beautiful in the silvery moonlight. The air feels sacred, like holy ground. Blood should not be shed in such a place, but they’re both beyond the point where things such as holiness have any effect on them. "Where is your shadow?" “You asked me to come alone,” Arthur answers truthfully, sword up. They circle each other like carrion birds, both waiting to swoop in for the kill. This will end tonight. It has to. Neither of them can afford otherwise.

entry.title: Some and Now None of You
entry.summary:
Author: Isthisusernameavailableornot

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 163,710Chapters: 52/62Kudos: 1,483

Summary: "Let him think I hate him. If that’ll stop him from risking his neck for me over and over again, then it’s a sacrifice I don’t have to think twice about." — Arthur finds out Merlin has magic. He also finds out how often Merlin risked his life for him and so, he does the only thing he can think of to protect him: banishment. Hurt and angry, Merlin leaves and swears to not look back. But, when two years pass and Morgana shows up at Merlin’s door, urging him to fill Gaius’ position as Court Physician, Merlin agrees. He really doesn’t know why, but Arthur is sure Merlin would do just about anything to get on his nerves. Unprepared for the shock of seeing Merlin back in the castle, Arthur is forced to speed along his plans to lift the ban on magic. But between stubborn councilors, a mysterious plague, a still angry Merlin, and Morgana being Morgana, Arthur is fairly certain he’ll lose his mind before the first year of his reign even ends.

entry.title: Wake Me Up When You’re Reincarnated (when I'm wiser and I'm older)
entry.summary:
Author: unrealisticdreamer101

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,197Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 48

Summary: Arthur died. Merlin didn’t. (Unfortunately). Fifteen centuries later, Merlin’s still alive—older, grumpier, and done with humanity. Then Arthur returns, reborn as a rich, distractible golden retriever of a man. His enemies? Reincarnated too. Arthur’s memory? Gone. Kings are out, influencers are in. So Merlin becomes a kid (long story), grows up with Arthur (longer story), and ends up his manager (don’t ask). Reincarnation, reluctant friendship (maybe romance, very salacious), and one exhausted wizard trying to stop destiny from falling apart—again. Includes some of Merlin's life before Arthur's return because history and travelling to other countries in history is really fun to write. I update when I update :) SPOILER:The romance only starts after Arthur's memories return.

entry.title: To Be Known
entry.summary:
Author: everydayistuesday

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,323Chapters: 1/9Kudos: 18

Summary: Gaius ushers them in. “I was just gathering my things to come check in on you. How are you feeling?”“Uh, headache. Deeply wrong.” And then Merlin adds offhandedly, “Oh, and like I’ve switched bodies with the Crown Prince of Camelot.” Or: Merlin and Arthur accidentally swap bodies. This would be a great opportunity for Merlin to relish in making Arthur muck out the stables, if the prat hadn't also gotten Merlin's magic in the exchange.
